article.headline: 3M Co. stock underperforms when compared to competitors despite strong trading day
article.body: Shares of 3M Co. MMM, +0.94% inched 0.95% higher to $169.30 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 0.88% to 3,477.14 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 0.57% to 28,586.90. This was the stock's third consecutive day of gains. 3M Co. closed $13.24 below its 52-week high ($182.54), which the company achieved on January 14th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +3.01% rose 3.01% to $3,286.65, Johnson & Johnson JNJ, +1.39% rose 1.40% to $150.97, and Danaher Corp. DHR, +2.42% rose 2.42% to $226.06. Trading volume (2.0 M) remained 394,729 below its 50-day average volume of 2.4 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
